title: HyperHDR LXC
textContent:
HyperHDR LXC 
                HyperHDR is
                    a highly optimized open source ambient lighting implementation based on modern digital video and
                    audio
                    stream analysis.
                To create a new Proxmox VE HyperHDR LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/hyperhdr.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡
                HyperHDR Interface: IP:8090
outerHTML:
HyperHDR LXC

HyperHDR is a highly optimized open source ambient lighting implementation based on modern digital video and audio stream analysis.

To create a new Proxmox VE HyperHDR LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/hyperhdr.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡

HyperHDR Interface: IP:8090
